result.title: Game Theory — Help!!!
result.content: I'm totally new to game theory. I think this problem 847 — A Multiplication Game can be solved using minimax algorithm. But I can't design the losing position for this problem. This problem may solve by finding pattern CF post, but I want to solve this problem with the concept of game theory (minimax algorithm). Any hint(how to think about losing position) for this problem form u, programmers??? :)
